post.author: 코스카
post.content:
When you apply for any jobs, you can mention my name, Samson Kim , as a referral.



=====================================================================
We need your help! Due to the current volume of positions we have open in ATI, and our anticipated recruitment needs we are planning a Career Fair. Please forward this email to anyone you know who may be interested in attending our event.

If you have any questions, please email the ATI Staffing Team.









Explore Career Opportunities at ATI

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



We would like to cordially invite you to meet with us. ATI's Recruiting Roadshow offers job seekers and hiring managers the opportunity to meet in person to explore career opportunities.





Toronto

Saturday November 15th, 2003

12:00pm - 4:00pm

ATI Headquarters, 1 Commerce Valley




Ottawa

Monday November 24th, 2003

5:00pm -9:00pm

O'Connor's Irish Pub



More Info
post.title: ATI Technologies Inc. Now Hiring--Young Kim님께서 보내주신 내용입니다.
